title: The provisions of these UDCPR shall be applicable except, express provisions of these TOD regulations
clause_text: The provisions of these UDCPR shall be applicable except, express provisions of these TOD regulations. However in case of any conflict between TOD Regulations and any other Regulation/s of UDCPR, TOD Regulations shall prevail for the NMRC.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
